text: Square of Ukrainian Heroes (), is a city square in Kyiv, Ukraine formed by a triangle shaped intersection of three streets: Velyka Vasylkivska, Hetmana Pavla Skoropadskoho and Yevhena Chykalenka. The square gives its name to the Square of Ukrainian Heroes station, of the Kyiv Metro. Category:Town squares in Europe Category:Kyiv
title: Square of Ukrainian Heroes
